verses.verse: And when <S%H1732>David<s%> was a <S%H4592>little<s%> <S%H5674>past<s%> the <S%H7218>top<s%> of the hill, behold, <S%H6717>Ziba<s%> the <S%H5288>servant<s%> of <S%H4648>Mephibosheth<s%> <S%H7125>met<s%> him, with a <S%H6776>couple<s%> of <S%H2543>asses<s%> <S%H2280>saddled<s%>, and upon them two <S%H3967>hundred<s%> loaves of <S%H3899>bread<s%>, and an <S%H3967>hundred<s%> bunches of <S%H6778>raisins<s%>, and an <S%H3967>hundred<s%> of summer <S%H7019>fruits<s%>, and a <S%H5035>bottle<s%> of <S%H3196>wine<s%>.

And the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H6717>Ziba<s%>, What meanest thou by these? And <S%H6717>Ziba<s%> <S%H559>said<s%>, The <S%H2543>asses<s%> be for the <S%H4428>king's<s%> <S%H1004>household<s%> to ride <S%H7392>on<s%>; and the <S%H3899>bread<s%> and summer <S%H7019>fruit<s%> for the young <S%H5288>men<s%> to <S%H398>eat<s%>; and the <S%H3196>wine<s%>, that such as be <S%H3287>faint<s%> in the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> may <S%H8354>drink<s%>.

And the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H559>said<s%>, And where is thy <S%H113>master's<s%> <S%H1121>son<s%>? And <S%H6717>Ziba<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto the <S%H4428>king<s%>, Behold, he <S%H3427>abideth<s%> at <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>: for he <S%H559>said<s%>, To <S%H3117>day<s%> shall the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H7725>restore<s%> me the <S%H4468>kingdom<s%> of my <S%H1>father<s%>.

Then <S%H559>said<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> to <S%H6717>Ziba<s%>, Behold, thine are all that pertained unto <S%H4648>Mephibosheth<s%>. And <S%H6717>Ziba<s%> <S%H559>said<s%>, I <S%H7812>humbly<s%> beseech thee that I may <S%H4672>find<s%> <S%H2580>grace<s%> in thy <S%H5869>sight<s%>, my <S%H113>lord<s%>, O <S%H4428>king<s%>.

¶ And when <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H980>Bahurim<s%>, behold, thence came <S%H3318>out<s%> a <S%H376>man<s%> of the <S%H4940>family<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H7586>Saul<s%>, whose <S%H8034>name<s%> was <S%H8096>Shimei<s%>, the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H1617>Gera<s%>: he came <S%H3318>forth<s%>, and <S%H7043>cursed<s%> still as he <S%H3318>came<s%>.

And he <S%H5619>cast<s%> <S%H68>stones<s%> at <S%H1732>David<s%>, and at all the <S%H5650>servants<s%> of <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%>: and all the <S%H5971>people<s%> and all the mighty <S%H1368>men<s%> were on his right <S%H3225>hand<s%> and on his <S%H8040>left<s%>.

And thus <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H8096>Shimei<s%> when he <S%H7043>cursed<s%>, Come <S%H3318>out<s%>, come <S%H3318>out<s%>, thou <S%H1818>bloody<s%> <S%H376>man<s%>, and thou <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H1100>Belial<s%>:

The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> hath <S%H7725>returned<s%> upon thee all the <S%H1818>blood<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H7586>Saul<s%>, in whose stead thou hast <S%H4427>reigned<s%>; and the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> hath <S%H5414>delivered<s%> the <S%H4410>kingdom<s%> into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of <S%H53>Absalom<s%> thy <S%H1121>son<s%>: and, behold, thou art taken in thy <S%H7451>mischief<s%>, because thou art a <S%H1818>bloody<s%> <S%H376>man<s%>.

¶ Then <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H52>Abishai<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H6870>Zeruiah<s%> unto the <S%H4428>king<s%>, Why should this <S%H4191>dead<s%> <S%H3611>dog<s%> <S%H7043>curse<s%> my <S%H113>lord<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%>? let me go <S%H5674>over<s%>, I pray thee, and take <S%H5493>off<s%> his <S%H7218>head<s%>.

And the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H559>said<s%>, What have I to do with you, ye <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H6870>Zeruiah<s%>? so let him <S%H7043>curse<s%>, because the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> hath <S%H559>said<s%> unto him, <S%H7043>Curse<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%>. Who shall then <S%H559>say<s%>, Wherefore hast thou done <S%H6213>so<s%>?

And <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H52>Abishai<s%>, and to all his <S%H5650>servants<s%>, Behold, my <S%H1121>son<s%>, which came <S%H3318>forth<s%> of my <S%H4578>bowels<s%>, <S%H1245>seeketh<s%> my <S%H5315>life<s%>: how much more now may this <S%H1145>Benjamite<s%> do it? let him <S%H3240>alone<s%>, and let him <S%H7043>curse<s%>; for the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> hath <S%H559>bidden<s%> him.

It may be that the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> will <S%H7200>look<s%> on mine <S%H5869%H6040>affliction<s%>, and that the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> will <S%H7725>requite<s%> me <S%H2896>good<s%> for his <S%H7045>cursing<s%> this <S%H3117>day<s%>.

And as <S%H1732>David<s%> and his <S%H582>men<s%> <S%H3212>went<s%> by the <S%H1870>way<s%>, <S%H8096>Shimei<s%> went <S%H1980>along<s%> on the <S%H2022>hill's<s%> <S%H6763>side<s%> over <S%H5980>against<s%> him, and <S%H7043>cursed<s%> as he <S%H1980>went<s%>, and <S%H5619>threw<s%> <S%H68>stones<s%> <S%H5980>at<s%> him, and <S%H6080>cast<s%> <S%H6083>dust<s%>.
And the <S%H4428>king<s%>, and all the <S%H5971>people<s%> that were with him, <S%H935>came<s%> <S%H5889>weary<s%>, and <S%H5314>refreshed<s%> themselves there.
¶ And <S%H53>Absalom<s%>, and all the <S%H5971>people<s%> the <S%H376>men<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>, and <S%H302>Ahithophel<s%> with him.

And it came to pass, when <S%H2365>Hushai<s%> the <S%H757>Archite<s%>, <S%H1732>David's<s%> <S%H7463>friend<s%>, was <S%H935>come<s%> unto <S%H53>Absalom<s%>, that <S%H2365>Hushai<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H53>Absalom<s%>, God <S%H2421>save<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%>, God <S%H2421>save<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%>.
And <S%H53>Absalom<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H2365>Hushai<s%>, Is this thy <S%H2617>kindness<s%> to thy <S%H7453>friend<s%>? why <S%H1980>wentest<s%> thou not with thy <S%H7453>friend<s%>?

And <S%H2365>Hushai<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H53>Absalom<s%>, Nay; but whom the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, and this <S%H5971>people<s%>, and all the <S%H376>men<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, <S%H977>choose<s%>, his will I be, and with him will I <S%H3427>abide<s%>.

And <S%H8145>again<s%>, whom should I <S%H5647>serve<s%>? should I not serve in the <S%H6440>presence<s%> of his <S%H1121>son<s%>? as I have <S%H5647>served<s%> in thy <S%H1>father's<s%> <S%H6440>presence<s%>, so will I be in thy <S%H6440>presence<s%>.
¶ Then <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H53>Absalom<s%> to <S%H302>Ahithophel<s%>, <S%H3051>Give<s%> <S%H6098>counsel<s%> among you what we shall <S%H6213>do<s%>.

And <S%H302>Ahithophel<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H53>Absalom<s%>, Go <S%H935>in<s%> unto thy <S%H1>father's<s%> <S%H6370>concubines<s%>, which he hath <S%H3240>left<s%> to <S%H8104>keep<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%>; and all <S%H3478>Israel<s%> shall <S%H8085>hear<s%> that thou art <S%H887>abhorred<s%> of thy <S%H1>father<s%>: then shall the <S%H3027>hands<s%> of all that are with thee be <S%H2388>strong<s%>.

So they <S%H5186>spread<s%> <S%H53>Absalom<s%> a <S%H168>tent<s%> upon the top of the <S%H1406>house<s%>; and <S%H53>Absalom<s%> went <S%H935>in<s%> unto his <S%H1>father's<s%> <S%H6370>concubines<s%> in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of all <S%H3478>Israel<s%>.

And the <S%H6098>counsel<s%> of <S%H302>Ahithophel<s%>, which he <S%H3289>counselled<s%> in those <S%H3117>days<s%>, was as if a <S%H376>man<s%> had <S%H7592>inquired<s%> at the <S%H1697>oracle<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%>: so was all the <S%H6098>counsel<s%> of <S%H302>Ahithophel<s%> both with <S%H1732>David<s%> and with <S%H53>Absalom<s%>.
